name: Secret Agent :The Last Mission
description:
Have you ever desired to be a secret agent and save your land? It’s time to become the spy master and bring glory to your land.

Deep in the looming mountains lies a top-secret base. The base is said to hold secret weapons of mass destruction. It is up to you to break into the base, battle your way to the weapons, and disarm them to save our planet.
You have been dropped onto the mountain. Break in the camp without being noticed. Wear an oxygen mask and get inside the underground tunnels. Beware of the hanging bats and floating debris. The end of the tunnel path will lead you to a utility room.
Then you need to enter different secret rooms and collect different security items to complete your missions. Collect weapons plans from secret room. Get memory card from the shark tank and plant computer virus. You must retrieve the codes from the white locked room by following secret passage. Game is full of interesting and challenging missions.
Complete all your missions tactically within limited time. Beware of the guards and lasers. Your final mission is to destroy the bombs and save the world. If you don’t do it properly, then you could set them off and possibly end the world.
